short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All in one Jira experience boost with power-ups including standup mode, custom theme and etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
All-in-one Jira experience booster with power-ups, including standup mode, custom theme, etc.

Jira Boost is a lightweight extension to add extra features and tweaks to Jira.

✔️ Quick Jump with address bar (aka, omnibox)
✔️ Custom your Jira looks
✔️ Enable Dark Mode on Jira
✔️ StandUp Mode, remove all distractions, focus on issues
✔️ Highlight issues with colorific cards
✔️ Automatically enter fullscreen mode
✔️ and more coming...

🏠 Homepage: https://hopsken.com/jira-boost

🙏 If you found this extension useful, then please support it by rating ★★★★★.

Jira Boost is also available for Arc, Firefox, Brave, and Edge.

Follow @Hopsken (https://twitter.com/hopsken) for unique tips, tricks, and free goodies.

---

HOW IT WORKS

1. Click on the extension icon.
2. A popup menu will appear; you can toggle features from there.

---
